Retina Overload. This Condition inflicts a ${blindquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • Sight-based Checks (Blind).
    • Removed by:
  • Cleaning out the eyes (Blind).

Ringing in Ears. This Condition inflicts a ${deafquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • Hearing & Speech-based Checks (Deaf).
    • Removed by:
  • Removing blockage (Deaf).

Agony. This Condition inflicts a ${painquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • All Checks (Pain).
    • Removed by:
  • A form of painkiller (Pain).

Traitorous Flesh. Whenever you gain three stacks of this Condition, make a Hardship Quarrel vs ${corruptionquanity}$ Hits or become changed. Changes:
  • Mutation (Corruption).
    • Remove by:
  • Painful purification (Corruption).

Profane Thoughts. Whenever you gain three stacks of this Condition, make a Hardship Quarrel vs ${stressquanity}$ Hits or become changed. Changes:
  • Madness (Stress).
    • Remove by:
  • Indulging in Vices (Stress).

Muscle Exhaustion & Burning Lungs. This Condition only takes up Enc slots, but cannot be removed if the source is an active Lingering Quarrel.
Remove by:
  • A good night’s rest.

Grapples, Nets. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Movement (Entangle).
    • Remove by:
  • Slipping or breaking out (Entangle).

Knock Outs. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Actions, Movement & Opponents can inflict any Injury of their choice while in melee (Helpless).
    • Remove by:
  • Receiving Damage (Helpless).

Discombulation. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Actions (Stun).
    • Remove by:
  • Smelling salts (Stun).

Pinned in Armor & Slipping in Mud. This Condition inflicts a -20% Check Penalty to you and a +20% Check Modifier to your opponents.
Remove by:
  • Spending an action to stand up.

Broken Bones & Torn Muscles. This Condition inflicts a ${traumaquanity* -20}$% penalty on all Checks involving the Location.
Remove by:
  • Resting one month per Rating.

rowLayout.tooltip: After activating a Rune, make an Hardship Quarrel vs the Rune’s Impurity in Hits
After activating a Rune, make an Hardship Quarrel vs the Rune’s Impurity in Hits.
rowLayout.rollMessage:
Hardship Check

Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$
Target score (Mod: ${totalModifier:=?{modifier:"Choose a modifier"|0|40|20|-20|-40} + hidglobalmod}$): ${robustnessValue:=hidmonsterscore + totalModifier}$
+Hits: ${additionalHits:=?{plusHits:"+Hits:"[number]}}$
Outcome: ${roll <= 5 ? 'Critical Hit' : (roll >= 96 ? 'Fumble' : (roll <= robustnessValue ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical Hit' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble' : 'Failure')))}$
Hits: ${hits:= (roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? (roll <= robustnessValue ? max(floor(robustnessValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1 + additionalHits, 6) : min(floor(robustnessValue/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6)) : (roll <= 5 ? max(floor(robustnessValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1, 6) : (roll >= 96 ? min(floor(robustnessValue/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6) : (roll <= robustnessValue ? floor(robustnessValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + additionalHits : floor(robustnessValue/10 - floor(roll/10)))))}$

Impurity Quarrel
Impurity Hits:
${sameRow('runeimpurity')}$
Quarrel Outcome:
${#result:= hits - sameRow('runeimpurity')}$ ${result == 0 ? "Victory at a Cost: Rune is activated, but you suffer one Corruption." : result <= -1 ? "Failure: Rune is hampered, you suffer one Corruption and the activation is delayed by [1d6] rounds." : "Victory: Rune is successfully activated."}$
